title: Southern Nights
teaser:
A young cadet is entrusted with vital records at a military academy; a woman remembers visiting her two mysterious aunts as a child; and a civil rights activist is imprisoned by police in Louisiana. Hosted by The Moth's founder, George Dawes Green.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media in Woods Hole, Massachusetts
contentencoded:
Edgar Oliver falls from grace at a military academy. 

Sheri Holman learns secrets about her Southern Gothic aunts.

Chuck McDew is imprisoned in Louisiana and charged with treason.
